channel.title: How do you change starting items, home, and teleportation spells?
channel.description:
Hiya all, Im asking another question cause I'm a complete noob. Dont flame me for not knowing as I see some people doing please.
Now, I want to know: 1.how to change the starting items of a player, 2.how to change teleportation spells (so they send the player to the coords I set for the spell) and 3.how to change the home (This probably ties in with teleportation spells somewhere :P)
I am NOT asking how to create teleports I already know that, how do I edit teleportation SPELLS. I cant find them anywhere.

item.title: How do you change starting items, home, and teleportation spells?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Ok I could of posted the beginners tutorials but then i came across it in the tutorials section
Find the tutorial here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,328858.0.html

Read full topic

thanks

can anyone tell me how to change the location of my home and teleportation spells? Thanks

item.source: How do you change starting items, home, and teleportation spells?

item.title: How do you change starting items, home, and teleportation spells?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Open up client.java. hold ctrl F and type in

if(starter == 0){

Once there scroll down a little bit and you will see
WARNING YOU WILL NOT HAVE THE EXACT SAME AS ME

addItem(1321, 1); addItem(1189, 1); addItem(556, 5000); addItem(557, 1000); addItem(558, 1000); addItem(555, 1000); addItem(554, 1000); addItem(562, 1000); addItem(841, 1); addItem(882, 500); addItem(995, 200000); }

The first numbers are the item codes you can edit those to others
The second batch of numbers are the numbers on how much you receive

WarningIf not putting in things non runes and you want to add more than just one you will have to put in the noted code.

Read full topic
